description:
A lightweight bottle cage that helps you get a handle on your hydration. Made from recycled fishing nets, the ReGrip bottle cage takes a little plastic out of the ocean and puts it to use on your bike.

  • Lightweight injection molded composite
  • Elongated mounting holes that you fine tune the position
  • Supportive wings hold most bike bottles and other 74mm diameter bottles with ease
name: Cannondale ReGrip Bottle Cage
